product_name: Darn Tough Padded Ultralight Ski/Ride Socks - Men's
long_description: The Darn Tough Padded Ultralight Ski/Ride men's socks are for those who prefer an ultralight non-padded sock with a lightweight swatch of padding that protects the shins. Darn Tough uses a custom-count, shrink-treated merino wool blend that enhances the comfort and durability that outdoor enthusiasts have come to expect. Merino wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions; it also prevents odors naturally. High stitch count and Lycra(R) spandex ensure a secure, foot-hugging fit; seamless toes reduce hot spots and blisters. Elastic support around the arches. Darn Tough recommends that you machine wash socks inside out in warm water on gentle cycle and tumble dry on low. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
